name: The Engineer (Dragon Theory Games)
description:
You are head engineer on a doomed starship. As power runs low, you must find a way to ration your resources to give yourself as long as possible. See how long you can hold out, balancing the needs of yourself and your crew against the straining power reserves.

Playable with keyboard or controller. Made for Ludum Dare 50 Jam - Delay the Inevitable. 

Notes:

Do not click start with a mouse - it will crash. Select it with the arrow/wasd keys and press spacebar, or with your controller.

Some doors are hard to see. If you're unable to move to another room, the door may be closed and need to be interacted with to be opened out of your way.
